intro: Odontostemma yunnanense, commonly known as the Yunnan odontostemma, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Araceae and is characterized by its distinctive inflorescence, which consists of a spadix surrounded by a spathe. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often in mountainous regions. Its leaves are broad and heart-shaped, with a glossy surface. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
